name: Hypergraphlib
tagline: School project - C++ Hypergraph modelisation Library using Boost and OpenMP.
body:
### Welcome to HyperGraphLib's page.
HHyperGraphLib is a C++ library for hypergraphs modelisation. The HyperGraphLib is designed to use hypergraphs inside your C++ app. Easily :)

### Hypergraph structure

This is a Hypergraph:

### Implemented algorithms

In this lib, you can work with those algorithms:

- Connected
- Dual
- Helly
- k-Regular
- k-Uniform
- Linear
- Simple

Some of them only decide of the associated property.

### Application instead of library

With the **demo** package (included by default), compile it with:

## Compilation
`
cmake CMakeLists.txt
make
`

## Try it :)

# How to generate a random hypergraph with 5 vertexes ?

`
./HypergraphLib --random 5 > myAwesomeHypergraph.txt
`

# How to get the adjacent matrix ?

`
./HypergraphLib --inputfile myAwesomeHypergraph.txt --adjacence
`

# How to know if my hypergraph is connected (each vertex can be reach) ?

`
./HypergraphLib --inputfile myAwesomeHypergraph.txt --connexe
`
# How to use HyperGraphLib ?

`
./HypergraphLib --help
`

### Authors and Contributors
This is a school project, by @alex-87, tell me what you think about HyperGraphLib at [twitter.com/Alex_alex0](https://twitter.com/Alex_alex0), on get support at [#HyperGraphLib](https://twitter.com/hashtag/HyperGraphLib)
